import React,{useState} from 'react' import "./Verification.css" import verifylogo from "./src/card@2x.png" export default function Verification({match}) { const [code, setcode] = useState("") const onChangeHandler = event => { setcode(event.target.value) } console.log(match.params.uId); const onSubmit = event => { event.preventDefault(); } return (

We will send a verification code to your phone number

onChangeHandler(e)} type="text" class="form-control" placeholder="Enter the code"/>
) }
